                                         java.awt.geom.Point2D p2,
                                         java.awt.geom.Point2D result)
        sets result to p1 - p2. If result is null, a new Point2D (cloned from p1) will be returned.

      • negative

        public static java.awt.geom.Point2D negative(java.awt.geom.Point2D p,
                                             java.awt.geom.Point2D result)
        sets result to -p. If result is null, a new Point2D (cloned from p) will be returned.

      • normalize

        public static java.awt.geom.Point2D normalize(java.awt.geom.Point2D p)
        Assumes p represents a vector and mormalizes it to a unit vector -- i.e. divides x and y by the magnitude of vector (x, y).

      • normalized

        public static java.awt.geom.Point2D normalized(java.awt.geom.Point2D p)

      • normalized

        public static java.awt.geom.Point2D normalized(java.awt.geom.Point2D p,
                                               java.awt.geom.Point2D result)
        Assumes p is a vector and sets result to the corresponding normalized unit vector (i.e. divides x and y by the magnitude of vector (x, y). If result is null, a new Point2D (cloned from p) will be returned.

      • scale

        public static java.awt.geom.Point2D scale(java.awt.geom.Point2D p,
                                          double factor)
        scales p by the given factor. Returns p itself (for chaining).

                                          double sx,
                                          double sy)

      • scaled

        public static java.awt.geom.Point2D scaled(java.awt.geom.Point2D p,
                                           double scale,
                                           java.awt.geom.Point2D result)
        sets result to scale * p. If result is null, a new Point2D (cloned from p) will be returned.

        sets result to (p.x + dx, p.y + dy) If result is null, a new Point2D (cloned from p1) will be returned.

                                        java.awt.geom.Point2D p2)

      • sum

        public static java.awt.geom.Point2D sum(java.awt.geom.Point2D p1,
                                        java.awt.geom.Point2D p2,
                                        java.awt.geom.Point2D result)
        sets result to p1 + p2. If result is null, a new Point2D (cloned from p1) will be returned.

        translates p by (p.x, p.y). Returns p itself (for chaining).
